bibl.title: Lost Dramas of Classical Athens. Greek Tragic Fragments.
bibl.note: The volume has its origins in the 'Tragic Fragments' conference held at the University of Exeter in September 1996. 10 contributions. - Pp. 1-6: Introduction; - 209-226: Bibliography; - 227-241: Index of fragmentary plays and other passages cited; - 243-248: General index.
bibl.seg: McHARDY Fiona, James ROBSON and David HARVEY (Edd.), Lost Dramas of Classical Athens. Greek Tragic Fragments.
Exeter, Exeter University Press, 2005, 8°, viii-248 pp. ISBN 0-85989-752-4. £40.

The volume has its origins in the 'Tragic Fragments' conference held at the University of Exeter in September 1996. 10 contributions. - Pp. 1-6: Introduction; - 209-226: Bibliography; - 227-241: Index of fragmentary plays and other passages cited; - 243-248: General index.
C.R. par Koen De Temmerman, AntCl 76 (2007) pp. 257-259. - Emma M. Griffiths, CR N.S., 57 (2007) pp. 22-24. - Bernhard Zimmermann, MusHelv 64 (2007) p. 240.
